defn: the bodyweight squat is a lower body strengthening exercise that can be performed virtually anywhere with no equipment and limited space. it's a highly functional movement working all the major muscles of the legs. set your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out. pull in your lower abs, and keep your eyes forward. slowly bend at the knees and drop your hips to lower your body. keep your heels flat on the floor. at the bottom of the exercise pause for a moment and strongly push back up to the starting position, mirroring the descent.

defn: the uneven bars or asymmetric bars is an artistic gymnastics apparatus. it is made of a steel frame. the bars are made of fiberglass with wood coating, or less commonly wood. the bars are placed at different heights and widths, allowing the gymnast to transition from bar to bar. a gymnast usually adds white chalk to the hands so that they can grip the bar better.
cleaned_defn: the uneven bars or asymmetric bars is an artistic gymnastics apparatus . it is made of a steel frame . the bars are made of fiberglass with wood coating , or less commonly wood . the bars are placed at different heights and widths , allowing the gymnast to transition from bar to bar . a gymnast usually adds white chalk to the hands so that they can grip the bar better .

defn: in volleyball, spiking is the act of scoring a point by slamming the ball over the net into the opposing court effectively and aggressively. in many ways, the mechanism of volleyball spiking is not altogether different from the act of slam dunking in the sport of basketball or smashing in the sport of tennis.
cleaned_defn: in volleyball , spiking is the act of scoring a point by slamming the ball over the net into the opposing court effectively and aggressively . in many ways , the mechanism of volleyball spiking is not altogether different from the act of slam dunking in the sport of basketball or smashing in the sport of tennis .

defn: dog walking is the act of a person walking with a dog, typically from the dog's residence and then returning. both owners and pets receive many benefits, including exercise and companionship.
cleaned_defn: dog walking is the act of a person walking with a dog , typically from the dog 's residence and then returning . both owners and pets receive many benefits , including exercise and companionship .

defn: equipment needed: wall. bend your elbows and begin to lean your body toward the wall until your nose almost touches it. ensure your back stays straight and your hips don't sag. push back to the starting position and repeat.
cleaned_defn: equipment needed : wall . bend your elbows and begin to lean your body toward the wall until your nose almost touches it . ensure your back stays straight and your hips do n't sag . push back to the starting position and repeat .

defn: mark (letters, words, or other symbols) on a surface, typically paper, with a pen, pencil, or similar implement. a long, thin, flat piece of wood or other hard material, used for floors or other building purposes.

defn: a toy consisting of a pair of joined discs with a deep groove between them in which string is attached and wound, which can be spun alternately downward and upward by its weight and momentum as the string unwinds and rewinds.
cleaned_defn: a toy consisting of a pair of joined discs with a deep groove between them in which string is attached and wound , which can be spun alternately downward and upward by its weight and momentum as the string unwinds and rewinds .
